Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Joan D'Arc
Reviews.Content: This was the largest size TV that would fit in my wall unit. I had some reservations at first, since I had never heard of this brand.  But I decided to take a chance.  I'm glad that I did.  I am completely pleased with this television.  The picture and color are excellent.  Sound is good, and the unit is full-featured.  I would buy this TV again, and I recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Better than higher priced televisions
Reviews.Author: Raimundo Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my 10 year old daughter months ago. Since it was on sale and it was so cheap even though the brand was unknown to me, I bought it since my kid will not be that demanding. I also bought the same day a 40 inches Westinghouse LED TV for myself. Guess what? This cheaper tv has a better image and performs better than my more expensive brand name tv. In fact it has a sharper image and clarity than my 55 inches Samsung plasma!For my other daughter I am definitely buying again this same tv.
